summary: A young boy becomes a target for crooks, after he claims to remember his past life and mentions precious jewels in a golden fortress.
cast: Soumitra Chatterjee|Santanu Bagchi|Ajoy Banerjee|Haradhan Bannerjee|Kushal Chakraborty|Bimal Chatterjee|Dibyendu Chatterjee|Rekha Chatterjee|Santi Chatterjee|Siddhartha Chatterjee|Harindranath Chattopadhyay|Santosh Dutta|Uday Singh Gailol|Sujit Ganguly|Nemai Ghosh|Manjula Kar|Ashok Mukherjee|Kamu Mukherjee|Shailen Mukherjee|Shiuli Mukherjee|Uttamram Nagar|Pradip Parekh|Devi Singh Rathour|Sunil Sarkar|Debjani Sengupta|Chandrama Singh|Sardar Jarnel Singh|N.L. Tak
title: Sonar Kella
